movies.name: Inception
movies.movie_plot: Kievan Rus, late 10th century. After the death of his father, the young Viking prince Vladimir of Novgorod is forced into exile across the frozen sea.
movies.movie_actors: Danila Kozlovskiy, Svetlana Khodchenkova, Maksim Sukhanov
movies.awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. 46 wins & 134 nominations total

movies.name: Breaking Bad
movies.movie_plot: A chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine with a former student in order to secure his family's future.
movies.movie_actors: Bryan Cranston, Aaron Paul, Anna Gunn
movies.awards: Won 16 Primetime Emmys. 155 wins & 247 nominations total

movies.name: Life and Passion of Christ
movies.movie_plot: Depicting well-known incidents in the life of Jesus Christ, this milestone of early cinema won world fame, huge audiences and a screen life of decades when most secular films of the time measured their commercial life in weeks.

movies.name: Orange Is the New Black
movies.movie_plot: Convicted of a decade old crime of transporting drug money to an ex-girlfriend, normally law-abiding Piper Chapman is sentenced to a year and a half behind bars to face the reality of how life-changing prison can really be.
movies.movie_actors: Taylor Schilling, Danielle Brooks, Taryn Manning
movies.awards: Won 4 Primetime Emmys. 53 wins & 150 nominations total

movies.name: Biking Borders
movies.movie_plot: Two young friends set off on a 15,000 km bicycle tour around the world for a unique fund-raising campaign - barely knowing what to expect, but with the dream of building a school in Guatemala.

movies.name: Vikings
movies.movie_plot: Vikings transports us to the brutal and mysterious world of Ragnar Lothbrok, a Viking warrior and farmer who yearns to explore--and raid--the distant shores across the ocean.
